name: prophecy
content:

Add to word list
[ C ] a statement that says what is going to happen in the future, especially one that is based on what you believe about a particular matter rather than existing facts: The minister suggested that the dire prophecies of certain leading environmentalists were somewhat exaggerated. These doom and gloom prophecies are doing little to help the economy.
[ U ] formal the ability to say what is going to happen in the future
